title: Friendly Fire
description: Abe never intended to be a lifelong bachelor.It just happened.Now he’s staring down fifty. Alone. Watching the men around him find what always seemed to escape his grasp.Unfortunately, the only woman to catch his eye in years is more than a handful.Elise is high-strung, smart-mouthed, and defiant as hell.And he can’t seem to stay away from her.Until she’s taken from him.Abe’s waited years to find his match.Now he will move heaven and Earth to find her and bring her back where she belongs.With him.****Elise has a problem.And it comes in the form of a six-foot-four stack of silver fox.Abe is not what she needs right now. He is a grown man. Mature. Knowledgeable.Experienced.But running from him is not an option.The man is too fast.Holding her ground with him will take courage. Strength.And a whole lot of bluffing.But Abe isn’t her only problem. She’s in the sights of an unknown threat.One willing to do anything to preserve their empire.
author: Jemma Westbrook
